Q: How to wrap a div to content and center it in Tailwind CSS 3 A:

Solution 1:

Add w-fit to the div container.

Solution 2:

Add flex and justify-center classes to the div container.

PS: in both cases you don't need flex-wrap class

Q: com.mongodb.MongoTimeoutException: Timed out after 10000 ms while waiting to connect A:

In my case the mongoDB connections require sufficient CPU and memory to handle network communication, authentication, and query execution. If the pod doesn't have enough resources, it may fail to establish a connection within the timeout period.

By having sufficient values by increasing the below has worked in deploy.yaml of Kubernetes cluster.

      proxyCPU: 220m
      proxyCPULimit: 520m
      proxyMemory: 400Mi
      proxyMemoryLimit: 900Mi

Q: Android Studio - Android Project View is Missing A:

Simple soultion. Open settings.gradle, remove any module names here (include: app for example).

Then sync. After sync put text back and sync again, it restores "Android" structure view, and it can help in case when your run/debug icons was disabled.
